entry.title: Manage Mercedes EV preconditioning from Home Assistant

link.title: Manage Mercedes EV preconditioning from Home Assistant

entry.content:
Intro

I recently got an Electric Vehicle (EV) and of course I want to get it integrated in Home Assistant :) Luckily, I found a HACS integration for MercedesME that provides me with a lot of data about my car and allows me to send some commands to it …
